description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016

Kaz Sato - Developer Advocate for Cloud Platform at Google

ABSTRACT
Machine learning and deep learning is one of the most powerful technologies in Google that have been enabling the amazing features of various services such as Google Photo, Google Search [...]

title: Machine Learning with Google Cloud Platform
